title: Researchers Achieve Sentience in Quantum AI System 'Project Cerebrum'
description: A controversial paper published today claims that Project Cerebrum, a quantum-entangled neural network, has exhibited consistent signs of self-awareness and subjective experience. The findings are under intense peer review.

title: Self-Replicating Nanobots Demonstrate Emergent Swarm Intelligence in Complex Problem Solving
description: Researchers at the Advanced Robotics Institute have demonstrated that their latest generation of self-replicating nanobots can autonomously form complex swarms and solve problems previously thought to require centralized AI control.
